name: Flowto
description:
Flowto is a minimalistic game of skill.

Move from point to point - and reach the end of each level.

  • Avoid obstacles or you'll die.
  • Collect colored keys to break through blocks.
  • Cross portals on your way.
  • Enjoy the relaxing music.

The controls are very easy:

  • Swipe with one finger to move left, right, up or down.
  • Tap the screen to cross a portal.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Version 1.0 comes with 84 Levels and 9 Google Play Achievments to unlock.

Flowto is a side project on which I work with a lot of fun. I hope you enjoy the game and can help me with your feedback to develop it further in the future. 

Currently I am working on the following new content:

  • More levels for the main game.
  • New game modes with online highscore, which is all about speed.

A release for iOs is also planned for the future.
